application.name: mat2cnet
application.brief: Converts an ISIS2 match point file to an Isis3 control network file.

description.p: This program converts an ISIS2 match point file to an Isis3 control network file.

history.change: Now IMAGE_NUMBER will be used before IMAGE_ID for matching files
Fixed bug where serial numbers were not correct.
Error message added for missing FSC's
Added exception message when the given MATCH file's "Matchpoint total" keyword is less than the number of actual Match Points in the file.

parameter.name: LIST2
parameter.brief: List of ISIS2 input cubes in the match point file.
parameter.description: A text file containing one column of ISIS2 cube file names. Every file used in the match point file should be represented in this list. The cubes must be available for the program to open and must be in the same order as the Isis3 cubes in LIST3

parameter.name: MATCH
parameter.description: Use this parameter to spexify the ISIS2 match point file to be converted to an Isis3 control network file.

parameter.name: LIST3
parameter.brief: List of ISIS3 input cubes in the match point file.
parameter.description: A text file containing one column of ISIS3 cube file names. Every file used in the match point file should be represented in this list. The cubes must be available for the program to open and must be in the same order as the Isis2 cubes in LIST2

parameter.name: CONTROL
parameter.description: Use this parameter to spexify the file name of the output Isis3 control network.

parameter.name: DESCRIPTION
parameter.brief: The description of this output control network.
parameter.description: A string describing this control network.

parameter.name: NETWORKID
parameter.brief: Name of the output control network
parameter.description: The ID or name of this particular control network. This string should be unique.

parameter.name: TARGET
parameter.brief: The body the control network is for
parameter.description: The planet or body the control points and measures in this control network are for.
